Instructions: 1. [Required]: Update URLs to point to your Platform Manager / AI Engine server.
2. [Optional]: You may save your LogRhythm API token in an encrypted PSCredential file (using Export-CliXml) and the module will load it when needed.
LrApiCredential is a .NET [PSCredential] object. Your LogRhythm api token can be kept in the password property of this object.
-> The [username] property should be set to the name of the API User that owns the token, but is not mandatory.
-> The [password] property should contain the token string obtained from LogRhythm, and is used for authentication.
If you'd like to save your api token in an encrypted file (exported by Export-CliXml), the module will automatically load it. LrApiCredentialPath.
(Warning) Never set a value for LrApiCredential in the SrfPreferences.json file.

Resources.Note: Graph/DefenderATP will be incorporated in the next major version - 1.3
